metadata.title: CVE-2013-6050 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in Links before 2.8 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (crash) via crafted HTML tables.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6050` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

links - 2.8-1ubuntu1
links2 - 2.8-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: links2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8-1ubuntu1').
